snippet: Whether it’s leading his team to an unprecedented number of wins, obliterating the record for 3-pointers or becoming the N.B.A.’s first unanimous most valuable player, Curry continues to astound.
abstract: Scott Cacciola On Pro Basketball Column analyzes Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry's record-setting performance in team's Game 4 Western Conference semifinal win over Portland Trailblazers; notes difficulty of comparing someone as singular as Curry to sport's greatest players.
lead_paragraph: Whether it’s leading his team to an unprecedented number of wins, obliterating the record for 3-pointers or becoming the N.B.A.’s first unanimous most valuable player, Curry continues to astound.

headline.print_headline: Red State. Blue State. Golden State.
headline.main: Stephen Curry Turns the Amazing Into the Everyday and Raises the Bar, Over and Over
